document_title: Glomerulonephritis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Glomerulonephritis is a serious urinary disease that can affect the patient's health and quality of life in the early stages. If the disease lasts long, the patient will face the risk of chronic glomerulonephritis and kidney failure. These are all diseases that are dangerous to the patient's life.
Therefore, when there are signs of suspected glomerulonephritis, you need to see a specialist immediately for timely diagnosis and treatment.
